channel.title: [Galkons] [Non] Adding New Item Slots
channel.description:
I've been trying to add a new inventory slot to avoid having Barbarian Assault remove your cape, and perhaps be a sufficient slot for anything else. However, when trying to find the codes for equipped items, I couldn't find anything to build off of.
Later I tried to simply convert this guide: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?topic=544290.0
However, I was unable to determine what the Non-renamed versions of the classes edited would be. I used a tool to search the entirety of my client files and found no instances that made any reference to equipping or removing items etc. I also have no idea what the Non-renamed versions of the client-sided code presented in the link are.
Any help is appreciated, thanks!
